column4: Hi :-) I upgraded to 10.04 a couple of hours ago, and since then my keyboard and/or my touchpad mouse has simply stopped. I did not have this problem before, it works perfect in GDM, I found nothing in logs, xorg.conf is no longer than 16 lines (is that normal? not a few years ago)
I mean, they simply stops randomly
they can work for an hour and then suddenly, no idea what triggers it
Run this and pastebin the results so we can see what drivers you have installed:  "dpkg -l | grep "xserver-xorg-input"
